column3: “This is a very sweet and floral bud. It provides a very smooth vape.  It hits you right upfront, making you feel like you have drunk 2 or 3 glasses of wine.  That effect transitions into a warmth that surges up from your core and out through your throat.  This body high is a warm and cozy feeling.  This strain provides for a beautiful relaxation effect making areas of muscle tension fade away. You will definitely exp...”

“Experience: A heavy high, slight tingling in the fingertips; inebriating, sedating, spacy, and slow. An opioid-like high, as if drinking a bottle of cough syrup, but without the paranoia. Relaxes the muscles in your face and body. Smoke it and become a soft, space-marshmallow…
Usage: Would recommend for nighttime. Best to unplug and go to bed. 
Look/Feel: She’s a rich dark purplish green, bushy and dense. The buds ar...”
“Punched me rite in the eyes 0.0”

“By the power of Greyskull!! This lady is da tits! Very energetic and happy/talky. I was not expecting the flavor and was pleasantly surprised! A little chemy but over sweet and berry flavors. Blueberry is one of my favorites, and this girl took a lot from its parent! Very good!”
“In Washington State we call this strain Blue Wreck.”
“Leaves u feeling nice and relaxed. Great med for pain and stress.”

“Smoked a blunt of this with bro while hotboxing the car and this shit was fire 🔥🔥🔥. I really enjoyed this strain the taste was sweet and the high lasted for good time . Definitely a strain I would use at night before going to bed”
“Good taste perfect to relax”
“This is bomb meds I smoke daily Mmm Mmm good”

“Grower:  Raven Grass
Harvest:  14 May 2015
Purchased: 24 Oct 2015
Quantity:  1g
Retailer:  The Novel Tree
THC (total):  18.84%
THCA:  17.60%
CBD:  0.19%

Three guesses as to what this sucker smells like.  It's a really pleasant blueberry and I swear I'm getting a little tobacco, like a cigar, as well.  But I've sampled a bit already, so keep that in mind.  :P

This one hits the hybrid sweet spot - energetic enough to...”

“This stuff is too good! Made the car smell like fruity pebbles. I've had blue dream and train wreck a few times each and this is an ultimate medium between these two great strains. Quality stuff! Taylor gang onifc”
“Felt like I was not in my stressful world for a bit.”
“I smoked a whole fat bowl and got way to high. Leaves u with a warm feeling and numbness. Would recommend for pain relief.”
“Very nice strain. it's always a good option for outdoorsy things like hiking.”

“One of my favorite sativa hybrid dominant flowers ever. This is an excellent pain reliever, it smells great, it tastes great and it has a very relaxing head high and deep body high... myself and another both fell asleep after smoking this . The next day my back pain and sciatica pain were not present and did not show for several hours. Not only did it help the pain when I smoked it but the next morning when I woke up...”

“This is a powerful combo, both these strains make it into my top 5 so I knew I was going to like the cross. Pretty much anything crossed with blueberry I will give a go. 

The buds were as expected, t'd up and very smelly, busting it up you get a bit of a sweet and spicey berry.
Upon smoking/vaping it that sweet and spicey berry comes out nicely on the after taste. The blueberry is very prominant in this mix. 

The h...”
“Very nice!  I was looking forward to trying this and I am not disappointed!”

“This is a powerful combo, both these strains make it into my top 5 so I knew I was going to like the cross. Pretty much anything crossed with blueberry I will give a go. 

The buds were as expected, t'd up and very smelly, busting it up you get a bit of a sweet and spicey berry.
Upon smoking/vaping it that sweet and spicey berry comes out nicely on the after taste. The blueberry is very prominant in this mix. 

The h...”
“If you're looking for an instant high, this is the strain for you.”

“one of the best buds i've ever got.. atleast this batch from a local dispo is really good.... buds are like rocks they actually look like the moon rocks dipped in kief. and dense as rock.. bigger than average buds with a blue hue to them... smoke is fantastic, smooth with a perfect balance of sativa and indica... takes a few to kick in but it's strong top notch for sure... got an o, would buy the whole lot.”
“Excellent blend”
“Very nice strain. it's always a good option for outdoorsy things like hiking.”

“Very nice indica dominant hybrid.  Tastes pretty nice and brings a very nice cerebral high, but without the normal shlumpification that comes hand in hand with most indicas is not seen here as the sativa side of this strain brings enough energy to combat this.  Solid strain if you want to just get shconed and listen to music or if you've got some trouble falling asleep.”
“good weed”

“30/10/12


Nicey nice”
“SMOOTH TASTE, FABULOUS SMOKE..QUICKLY BECOMING A REAL BIG FAVORITE”
“Love this strain sweet taste”
“Looks beautiful and tastes absolutely delicious. It put me in a great mood and the burn out didn't make me tired what so ever”
“Very,Very,Nice. We doin it  real in Sedalia,MO. Buddy brought this in from Humbolt. Every time something new. This strain is the best yet.”

“Finally, a strain to put my mind at rest. Taste is on the stronger, earthier side. After splitting a half gram joint with a friend, the true serenity and peace of the spirit of the plant set in. Light body awareness and everything becomes simple and clear. The feeling was, nothing to do, nowhere to go, just simple positivity. Eating food was rhythmic, calming and delicious. No eye or mouth dryness. I forgot my worrie...”

“Good uplifting effects yet calming down stress after first few hits. High creates a happy atmosphere for too short of a high. Doesn’t fully remove pain but you simply find yourself laughing at something that makes you forget your pain.”

“Super chill mode is the best way to describe this. I did not get the energizing effects described by others at all, but I will try again at some point to confirm. I've tried several Blueberry crosses and this carries the least aroma and flavor, but more of the indica affects than expected. Needs more prominence of both parents to impress.”

“Smoked a pre roll of this not even a gram..i am a regular smoker...this put me on my ass! I said i was good but couldnt clip it because how tastee it was!! Def take your time to much leads to paranoia”
“impressive. sweet with long lasting high”
“One of my all time favorite buds. The smell and taste are not to be beat and the high will have you going for hours. Amazing smoothness and smoke”
“good weed”

“Very nice indica dominant hybrid.  Tastes pretty nice and brings a very nice cerebral high, but without the normal shlumpification that comes hand in hand with most indicas is not seen here as the sativa side of this strain brings enough energy to combat this.  Solid strain if you want to just get shconed and listen to music or if you've got some trouble falling asleep.”

“This is a great daytime strain for when I need to be a little more focused. It's a nice, mellow high, enough to get me relaxed, bit still be able to go hiking, go to the gym, our get some serious work done.”
“This is a great strain when I need a little extra focus. It's a nice mellow high that's perfect if I'm going hiking, to the gym, or need to get some serious work done.”
“Wow, don't think I've ever eaten so much!!!”
“Fun buzz even for a blue dream cross”
“very strong hit followed by an aurge to eat”

“Blue Dream is my absolute favorite strain and I had some and my girl had some Trainwreck so we mixed them together and created one of the greatest buds I ever smoked. Blue Train is that fire. Amazing Head High. Literally feels like someone is throwing blueberries at your face. Very relaxing feeling. Can't wait to spark again  5/5
💙🚆🍁🔥🔥”
“This was one of the first high strains that I smoked and it knocked me on my ass”

“When the delivery driver gave me a few different hybrids to choose from, my nose instantly kept coming back to this strain. The strong, piney smell, with the intense sticky buds also kept be coming back, and eventually, i purchased 11 grams. 

The high offers an instant head rush, followed by a stuck in time" feeling
column4: which is pretty cool for zoning out after a long day at work. I am in chill mode for 20 minutes

column3: “this was a very sane, relaxing, and zen like high. Used from a bong before bed,  it gave me a very calm feeling but without any cloudiness”

“I was very impressed with  nice fluffy egg shaped  big  buds  full crystals   fruity berry with that tastes  of the berrys and sour hints full-body high super for morning medication or after you  get off after that shower  my cronic bacc pain just melted  away and all my stress was gone nice”

“Wow, this is some good stuff. Picked up 3 g's and honestly only need one bowl to get stoned. You can feel the haziness and the craziness from the trainwreck, but there's this light euphoria and bliss in the background from the Blue Dream. i would say it's a 75/25 sativa dominant hybrid. makes you really aroused also. not good for if you need to get stuff though but perfect weekend bud. 9/10, really dense nugs”
“I used this stain for the first time to help me get to sleep in the evenings and holy wow.. Its working.”

“I got this knowing it would be a sativa and would be helpful for daytime use but then I noticed that for me it seems more like an indica then a sativa because seriously this med puts me out. And I am NOT the only one who feels that way. My wife and I both have been smoking this stuff for a week and it does not get old it has the best high ever, has some couch lock and I've been trying different mixes to see if I can ...”

“I was going to write something about this strain but then I smoked it and its been 45 minutes and I just cant stop laughing... I feel so relaxed and giggly.  I would suggest everyone try some. Delicious and pungent!!! Nice Full Nugs!”
“Classic trainwreck, but my god I ate my fridge 20 times over. Would definitely give a 5/5 if I wasn't already 30 pounds overweight before I got the chance to try this strain.”
“Didn't like it ..made  me mad and inpatient..was not relaxing ..this never happened before ..I love blue dream idk very upset”
“Blue Dream plus Trainwreck 💙🍁🔥”
“Blue train wreck was was good I liked it but it was a great experience for me”
